<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deimatic Display](/Feats.aspx?ID=4733) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 131 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)

</column>

---

Imitating animal threat displays, you make yourself appear larger and more imposing. Attempt an Intimidation check to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=2395) each enemy within 30 feet. This attempt has the [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=727) trait, loses the auditory trait, and you don't take a penalty if the creature doesn't understand your language. Roll your check only once and compare it to the Will DC of each target. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the check against animal, fungus, and plant creatures and take a –2 circumstance penalty against other creatures. Each target is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.
name: Deimatic Display
